Key Match Events: Pakistan's innings could not achieve lift-off, succumbing to 121. Sri Lanka ambled home with 18 balls and five wickets to spare, winning by 5 wickets.
Post-Match Reflections: Pathum Nissanka anchored the chase, hitting an unbeaten 55 off 48.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 12th match of the Super Four in the Men's T20 Asia Cup.
Others: Wanindu Hasaranga was the standout bowler for Sri Lanka, taking 3 for 21.
